## RemoveRange.updateSelection() method

Applies the current operation on the specified selection range and returns the updated result.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
updateSelection(range: FlowRange, mine: boolean): FlowRange | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  range | [FlowRange](./scribing.flowrange.md) |  |
|  mine | boolean | Specifies whether the current operation is executed by the same user that owns the selection. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[FlowRange](./scribing.flowrange.md) \| null
